name: TMASolutions
overview:
Company Overview

TMA is a leading software outsourcing company in Vietnam with 1,200+ engineers and more than 14 years of experience in providing quality software services for many world leading companies such as Avaya, Alcatel-Lucent, Ericsson, Genband, Siemens, Amdocs, Nortel, NTT, NEC, Toshiba, Andrew, IBM, Oracle, Flextronics, Juniper Networks, Shoretel, Telus.

Company Profile

• TMA was founded in 1997 and have overseas offices: Canada, U.S, Japan, Ireland, and Australia. We have many track records: One of the top 15 global companies with “Offshore Software Outsourcing Best Practices” (Aberdeen Group, 2002), Gold medal for software export in 8 consecutive years (2004 – 2011), Top ICT companies (2009 – 2011)

• TMA ensure the quality solutions through skillful engineering team which we hire only top 5% of candidates, 2/3 of engineers at least 3 years experience, 40% have overseas experience, All engineers can speak English, Other languages: Japanese, French, Chinese Our main services: • Software Services: Development, testing, maintenance, porting/migration, customization, internationalization/localization • Mobile Solutions: Develop mobile applications and solutions for enterprises and consumers (www.mobi-development.com) • New Product Development: Develop new software products by collaborating with foreign partners
